definition: abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: On the contrary, Singaporeans are seemed to be 'smiling away' to have her.
sentences.chinese: 相反新加坡人卻因爲從此擁有了她而“笑逐顏開”。

sentences.english: His mother was from Singapore, his father from Cuba.
sentences.chinese: 馬丁內茲的媽媽是新加坡人，爸是古巴人。

sentences.english: Lim and Elaine Teo, 34, both Singaporeans, traveled together.
sentences.chinese: 小林和34歲的新加坡人艾琳，兩者一起旅遊。

sentences.english: Singaporeans should help immigrhelpless ishs integrdined on into society. Cla connections! for exa triingod!
sentences.chinese: 新加坡人該當幫助新移民融入社會。

sentences.english: After all, we are doing this for the sake of Singaporeans.
sentences.chinese: 其實，這項政策也是以新加坡人的利益爲出發點。

sentences.english: At restaurants, Singaporeans tend not to leave tips.
sentences.chinese: 在飯館就餐時，新加坡人一般都不留小費。

sentences.english: The majority of the Singaporeans lives in high-rise apartment blocks that was built by the government.
sentences.chinese: 大多數新加坡人居住在政府建造的組屋。

sentences.english: This is where Singaporeans must remain more united to face the rougher times ahead.
sentences.chinese: 前路難行，新加坡人這一刻就應該更加團結。

sentences.english: Can a panacea be found to improve Singaporeans' social graces?
sentences.chinese: 能否找到一個妙方，使新加坡人的行爲優雅起來？

sentences.english: Is your girl friend from Singapore?
sentences.chinese: 你女朋友是新加坡人嗎？

sentences.english: Popis: …to Singapore to replace its rebellious locals.
sentences.chinese: 新加坡來取代叛逆的本土新加坡人。

sentences.english: THE 12th Singapore Hit Awards (SHA) happening tonight is truly a Singaporean event.
sentences.chinese: 今晚的第12屆新加坡金曲獎真是新加坡人的盛會。

sentences.english: Many Singaporeans have set up businesses in China and serve the Chinese market.
sentences.chinese: 許多新加坡人到中國投資辦廠，服務中國市場。

sentences.english: Stef is Singapore's favorite daughter, or Sun, if you will.
sentences.chinese: 孫燕姿是我們新加坡人最寵愛的女兒。

sentences.english: Malays and other races are counted as Non-Singaporean by them.
sentences.chinese: 在他們看來，馬來人和其他種族的人是非新加坡人。

definition: ethnic Chinese/non-Chinese citizen of Chinese ancestry
